scripts.test:cart: cucumber-js features/add_to_cart.feature && node reporter.js && start reports/cucumber-report.html
scripts.test:login: cucumber-js features/login.feature && node reporter.js && start reports/cucumber-report.html
scripts.test:quantity: cucumber-js features/verify_product_quantity.feature && node reporter.js && start reports/cucumber-report.html
scripts.test:run: cucumber-js features/%npm_config_test%.feature && node reporter.js && start reports/cucumber-report.html
